events.message: I would like to file a claim regarding a car collision that occurred yesterday evening at the intersection near my home.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as it involves a vehicle collision and damage to the insured car.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist you through the entire process of your auto accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your accident claim and assure you that it will be processed as quickly as possible.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photographs of the accident site, and your vehicle repair estimate to proceed.
The requested documents including the police report and repair estimates have been submitted via the online portal.
An investigation into the circumstances of your auto accident has been initiated to verify all related details.
The investigation regarding your car accident has been completed confirming the facts of the collision and damages.
Based on the findings, a settlement amount has been proposed to cover the repair costs of your vehicle.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement, and noted your concerns about the repair timeframe.
Your auto accident claim has been approved for settlement as per the agreed terms and conditions.
The payment covering the approved settlement amount has been issued and should reflect in your account shortly.
Your claim regarding the recent auto accident has been officially closed with all matters satisfactorily resolved.
